mapper.select: SELECT bt.id, bt.title, btc.`name` as bbsSection, bt.replyNum, bt.collectNum, bt.visitNum, bt.sort, bt.createTime, bt.`status`, bt.content, bt.creator, bt.creatorId, bt.ctgId, bt.isElite, bt.isHot, bt.isReply, bt.isStick, bt.sectionId FROM bbs_topic bt LEFT JOIN bbs_topic_ctg btc ON bt.ctgId = btc.id WHERE bt.`status`!= 9 AND bt.sectionId = #{sectionId} ORDER BY bt.isStick DESC, bt.createTime DESC limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(1) as count FROM bbs_topic bt WHERE bt.`status` != 9
AND bt.`status` = #{status}

SELECT bt.id, bt.title, bt.replyNum, bt.collectNum, bt.visitNum, bt.createTime, bt.creator FROM bbs_topic bt WHERE bt.`status`!= 9 AND bt.title like '%${keyword}%' ORDER BY bt.isStick DESC, bt.createTime DESC limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(1) as count FROM bbs_topic bt WHERE bt.`status`!= 9 AND bt.title like '%${keyword}%'
select id,title as content,createTime as createDate from bbs_topic where `status` != 9 order by createTime desc limit 0,12
select id,title as content,createTime as createDate from bbs_topic where `status` != 9 order by visitNum desc limit 0,12
